contributors: : Tatsuya Daitoku, Cyber Defense Institute, Inc.
description: BlackTechis a suspected Chinese cyber espionage group that has primarily targeted organizations in East Asia--particularly Taiwan, Japan, and Hong Kong--and the US since at least 2013.BlackTechhas used a combination of custom malware, dual-use tools, and living off the land tactics to compromise media, construction, engineering, electronics, and financial company networks.[1][2][3]
